title: Two-step polyhydroxybutyrate production from hydrogenic effluent by freshwater microalgae Coelastrella sp. KKU-P1 and Acutodesmus sp. KKU-P2 under mixotrophic cultivation
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Kamolwan Thepsuthammarat, Tsuyoshi Imai, Pensri Plangklang, Sureewan Sittijunda, Alissara Reungsang
